evidence.claim: MedSolz is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring patient data security.
The company utilizes X12 transaction sets for healthcare billing and claims processing.
MedSolz implements FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare data exchange.
The company supports EHR integration through HL7 protocols.

icp.icp_reason: MedSolz focuses on HIPAA, X12, and EDI solutions indicating alignment with API-first healthcare data exchange.
